title: Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes v0.4.133261 more mods
description:
Collect your favorite Star Wars characters, like Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Darth Vader, and more, from every era â€“ then conquer your opponents in epic, RPG-style combat. Build mighty teams and craft the best strategy to win battles across iconic locations to become the most legendary hologamer in the galaxy. Join a Guild to team up with friends and lead Raids to take down powerful bosses. You can also unlock new characters like Rey and Kylo Ren from Star Warsâ„¢: The Force Awakensâ„¢ and put them on your team!

â€œVisually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Warsâ„¢ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.â€ â€“ USA Today

"â€¦ The best Star Wars game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." â€“ Gamezebo

CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM
Build powerful light and dark side teams with heroes and other characters from the Star Wars universe. Make strategic choices and pick characters with complimentary abilities to construct squads like never before!

COLLECT ICONIC HEROES
Collect characters from the original trilogy and prequel films, animated TV shows like Star Warsâ„¢: The Clone Warsâ„¢ and Star Wars Rebelsâ„¢ â€“ and even Star Wars: The Force Awakens!

TRAIN POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Make tactical decisions and equip your heroes with powerful gear to enhance their damage. Unlock special leader abilities to buff your team and unleash moves like Darth Sidiousâ€™s Force Lightning, Chewbaccaâ€™s Wookiee Rage, and more.

TEAM UP IN GUILDS
Lead Raids with friends and face off against powerful bosses like the Rancor by joining or creating a customizable Guild! Coordinate with your guildmates through Guild Chat and engage in Daily Guild Activities to earn shared rewards based on individual and Guild Leaderboards.

MASTER THE STRATEGY
Feel the excitement of beating opponents in epic battles as you master the galactic hologames in a far off cantina. Heroes will need to upgrade their powerful attacks and unique abilities to take down other squads in Squad Cantina Battles and the PvP Squad Arena for galactic greatness. Create the ultimate strategy to collect and conquer.

FIGHT IN LEGENDARY LOCATIONS
Complete epic missions on Hoth, Bespin, Tatooine, Coruscant, and beyond. Unlock special characters to play through in light and dark side campaigns.

Whatâ€™s new:
Guilds have arrived! Join or create your own customizable Guild, and reap rewards based on your individual and Guild ranking. The update includes:
â€¢ Guild Raids â€“ band together to take out giant bosses with dynamic battle phases
â€¢ Guild Daily Activities with shared and individual rewards
â€¢ Guild Chat â€“ connect and strategize with friends
â€¢ New Guild Shipments with high-rarity items and Shards you can purchase with Individual Guild Currency
Thanks for playing!

Mod 1:
- Galactic War Table Unlocked
- No Skill Cooldown

Installation instructions: 
1. Install the normal version.
2. Finish the tutorial and connect to your google account. 
3. Install Lucky Patcher (If you do not already have it installed), give it root permissions and go to toolbox. Scroll down until you find "Patch to Android" tap it. Check the first 2 boxes and apply.
4. Signed is for non-rooted users. Unsigned is for root users only. You can still play as guest.
5. Uninstall the game but donâ€™t clear itâ€™s data. Now install one mod of your choosing. With Modded Google Play you can install over the normal version.
6. Launch the game and it will log you into Google Play.
7. Users with modded google play can only play as Guests in mod2 and mod3. You can still connect to

-Mod1 is a request to avoid God mode. Works but untested in online areas.
-Mod2 is recommended as it's safer. But, still play smart.
-Mod3 has a much higher chance of being detected. The Galactic War wins can be seen on your stat page. I didn't go huge with the damage increase but is still high enough to one shot most stuff.

Requirements: Android OS 4.1+
